issue.title: Write a test to make sure a new DB is downloaded when an already downloaded DB exists with an old schema

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body: In the download method, https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug/blob/d1016a351603d948230188fa3f370a057a1a8127/bugbug/db.py#L89, we should handle the case where the DB is already downloaded but is using an older schema version than the current one.

issue.title: Consider skipping meaningless components when calculating path distance

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.title: Instead of applying patch in git, fetch it from the local Mercurial repository

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
Using git-cinnabar, we can replace https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug/blob/e60a51b6b744ae1c1bbd65cbc28fc7f796f851e0/scripts/commit_classifier.py#L358-L380 and just fetch the commit from the local Mercurial repository where we already applied the patch.

Then, we can stop installing `patch` in our Docker image: https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug/blob/e60a51b6b744ae1c1bbd65cbc28fc7f796f851e0/infra/dockerfile.commit_retrieval#L10.

issue.title: Added Some Guidelines

repository.name: ProjectIdeas
repository.description: A Place to write down the project ideas and to plan them

issue.body:
1) When I start looking for Issue and their contributions, It is very difficult to find whether the issue is  being worked on. 
2) Secondly, Identifying the issue's purpose seems little difficult. Please tag them with labels.
3) Please provide some template for Creating Issue
4) Example Can be: 

- Task
Collection of Tamil Names - Noun
- Details
To train NER in Tamil
- Input
Pdf files from ....
- Expected Output
Nouns 
- Others

5) Reference:   https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug/issues/1092

issue.title: Classify multiple bugs at a time in the code to find bug-fixing commits

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
We are classifying one bug at a time in https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug/blob/22222328ad277b94f08ea4f4634cee87db0ad013/scripts/regressor_finder.py#L264, we could instead collect the bugs in a list and then classify them in one go.

The script can be easily tested by running `python -m scripts.regressor_finder bug_fixing`.

issue.title: Add a "Select All" button next to each filter

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body: Right now users have to manually select all the items, it'd be nice to add a small "Select All" button next to each filter which has multiple selectable options.

issue.title: Organize charts in the summary view in a nicer way

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body: Currently charts take the entire screen width and are positioned one after another vertically, something like https://apexcharts.com/javascript-chart-demos/dashboards/ would be nicer and more readable.
